department.ch: 土木工程學系營建管理碩士班
department.en: Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering

goal.ch: 提供同學各種有關溝通之理論與實務概念，透過個案研討讓同學領略溝通之方法與技巧。
goal.en: "Provide students the nutshell of communication, from personal level to project or organizational level. By case study, students will learn to apply communication techniques to resolve conflicts."

outline.ch:
1. Introduction & 人際溝通
2. 人際與組織溝通(1)
3.  個人時間管理
4. 專案溝通管理
5. 電腦發展與Web 應用
6. 管理資訊系統MIS
7. ERP簡介
8. BIM
9. RFID & WSN
outline.en:
1. Introduction & People Communication
2. Organization and Communication
3.  Time Management
4. Project Communication
5. Computer Advancement and Applications
6. Management Information System
7. Enterprise Resource Planning
8. Building Information Moduling
9. RFID & WSN

gradMethod.ch:
1. Narration: 20%
2. Clerking: 15%
3. Final Exam: 20%
4. Term Report: 15%
5. Participation: 10%
6. Quiz: 20%
gradMethod.en:
1. Narration: 20%
2. Clerking: 15%
3. Final Exam: 20%
4. Term Report: 15%
5. Participation: 10%
6. Quiz: 20%

ch.competencies: 具備專案管理專業能力
具備獨立研究及創新思考能力
具備專案執行及團隊合作領導能力
具備永續與國際觀及社會服務能力

en.competencies: Capability of independent research and innovative thinking
Capability of executing a project and leading the team work
Capability of serving the society with a vision of globalization and sustainability

ch: 系所:限土木工程學系營建管理碩士在職專班。
en: Department:Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering only.
